channel.title: Home on NFLDP Genomic Facility
channel.description: Recent content in Home on NFLDP Genomic Facility

item.title: DNA Sequencing Services
item.description:
1.1 Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS)

Platform: Illumina NovaSeq 6000 / NextSeq 2000

Applications:

  • De novo genome assembly
  • Variant discovery (SNPs, InDels, SVs)
  • Population genetics studies
  • Breed characterization
  • Comparative genomics

Coverage Options:

Coverage Read Length Applications Price (SAR)
10x PE150 Variant calling, basic analysis 2,500/sample
30x PE150 High-quality variant calling 4,500/sample
60x PE150 SV detection, haplotyping 8,000/sample
100x+ PE150 De novo assembly, clinical Custom Quote

Sample Requirements:

  • DNA: 1-2 μg
  • Concentration: ≥20 ng/μL
  • 260/280: 1.8-2.0
  • DIN ≥7.0

Turnaround: 4-6 weeks

item.title: Who We Are
item.description:
Livestock and fisheries Resource Advancement. “Where science meets sustainability, empowering farmers, researchers, vets, and policymakers with the data that build healthier and more productive animals and a safer future”

We are at the forefront of creating new genomics digital platforms designed to improve the health and productivity of local animal resources. Our initial focus encompasses key livestock species: camels, sheep, cattle, chickens, horses, goats and aquatic resources in the Kingdom.

item.title: RNA Sequencing Services
item.description:
2.1 mRNA-Seq (Poly-A Selection)

Platform: Illumina NovaSeq 6000 / NextSeq 2000

Applications:

  • Gene expression profiling
  • Differential expression analysis
  • Transcript quantification
  • Alternative splicing

Read Depth Options:

Depth Recommended For Price (SAR)
20M reads Model organisms, well-annotated genomes 1,500/sample
40M reads Standard mammalian transcriptomes 2,200/sample
60M+ reads Non-model organisms, discovery 3,500/sample

Sample Requirements:

  • Total RNA: 1-2 μg
  • RIN ≥7.0
  • 260/280: 1.8-2.2

Turnaround: 4-5 weeks

2.2 Total RNA-Seq (Ribo-depletion)

Applications:

  • Non-coding RNA profiling
  • Bacterial transcriptomics
  • Degraded RNA samples

Price: 2,500 SAR/sample

item.title: What We Do
item.description:
Unlocking Potential: Healthier and productive Animals, Sustainable Practices

We aim to transform the industry in the kingdom and enable data driven economy by accelerating genetic improvement and protecting livestock and fisheries from threats of pathogens. Transforming the domain requires a strategic alignment and enablement from the national strategy of biotechnology, as NFLDP embracing biotech as the main thrust for its progress.

item.title: Epigenomics Services
item.description:
3.1 Whole Genome Bisulfite Sequencing (WGBS)

Platform: Illumina NovaSeq 6000

Applications:

  • DNA methylation profiling
  • Epigenetic variation
  • Imprinting studies

Coverage: 30x

Price: 5,500 SAR/sample

Sample Requirements:

  • DNA: 2-5 μg
  • High quality (DIN ≥8.0)

Turnaround: 6-7 weeks

3.2 Reduced-Representation Bisulfite Sequencing (RRBS)

Applications:

  • Cost-effective methylation screening
  • CpG island profiling

Coverage: 50-100x (at CpG sites)

Price: 2,800 SAR/sample

Turnaround: 5-6 weeks

3.3 ChIP-Sequencing (ChIP-Seq)

Platform: Illumina NextSeq

Applications:

  • Histone modification mapping
  • Transcription factor binding
  • Chromatin accessibility

Read Depth: 20-40M reads

item.title: Why It Matters
item.description:
Positive Impacts: From Farm to all. “This initiative aligns with Vision 2030 and global One Health frameworks”

Our collective efforts are aimed at delivering widespread benefits:

Improve Food Security and Safety: Healthier, more productive animals contribute directly to a more stable, reliable, and safe food supply for growing populations.

Empower Farmers and Producers: Provide innovative tools, data-driven insights, and knowledge resources that help farmers and aquatic producers raise healthier animals more effectively and sustainably.

item.title: Microbial & Metagenomics Services
item.description:
4.1 16S rRNA Amplicon Sequencing

Platform: Illumina MiSeq

Applications:

  • Bacterial community profiling
  • Microbiome diversity analysis
  • Taxonomic classification

Regions:

Region Primers Applications Price (SAR)
V3-V4 341F/805R Standard bacterial profiling 650/sample
V4 515F/806R Gut microbiome 600/sample
Full Length 27F/1492R High-resolution taxonomy 1,200/sample

Read Depth: 50,000-100,000 reads/sample

Turnaround: 3-4 weeks

4.2 ITS Amplicon Sequencing

Applications:

  • Fungal community profiling
  • Mycobiome analysis

Regions: ITS1 or ITS2

Price: 700 SAR/sample

Turnaround: 3-4 weeks

4.3 Shotgun Metagenomics

Platform: Illumina NovaSeq 6000

item.title: Success Stories
item.description:
From data to impact

  • “Tracking Salmonella outbreak in livestock”
  • “Using SNPs to identify conservation targets for Arabian Peninsula breed”
  • “Build reference genome for Arabian Peninsula animals”
  • “Presenting our pioneer work in international scientific conferences"
  • “Got invitations to present our active research Roslin Institute seminar, a world leader in animal health research"
  • “Collaborative AMR surveillance with regional labs"

item.title: Genotyping Services
item.description:
5.1 SNP Array Genotyping

Platforms:

  • Illumina Infinium (Custom or catalog arrays)
  • Affymetrix Axiom

Applications:

  • GWAS
  • Genomic selection
  • Population structure
  • Parentage verification

Array Density Options:

Density SNPs Species Examples Price (SAR)
Low Density 10K-30K Livestock, Aquaculture 150/sample
Medium Density 50K-100K Livestock breeding 280/sample
High Density 600K-1M Cattle, Sheep 450/sample
Custom Array Variable Any species Custom Quote

Turnaround: 3-4 weeks

5.2 Microsatellite (STR) Genotyping

Applications:

  • Parentage testing
  • Individual identification
  • Genetic diversity

Markers: 12-25 STRs

item.title: Services
item.description:
Comprehensive Genomic Solutions

Enhanced genomic services tailored to your research and breeding needs.

Standard Package

  • Standard genotyping services
  • Basic bioinformatics analysis
  • Standard turnaround times
  • Email support
  • Raw data delivery

Advanced Package

  • Advanced genomic analysis
  • Custom bioinformatics pipelines
  • Priority processing
  • Dedicated project manager
  • Phone/video consultation
  • Interactive reports

Partnership Tier

  • Comprehensive genomic solutions
  • Long-term partnership agreements
  • Custom method development
  • On-site training and support
  • Co-development opportunities

Service Categories

  1. Understanding Animal Genetics – Exploring the Blueprint of Life
  2. Tracking and Understanding Diseases – Proactive Animal Health Management
  3. Data Resources, Visualization & Analytical Tools
View Full Service Catalog

item.title: Contact Us
item.description:
Get in Touch – We’d Love to Hear From You!

Whether you have a question, a suggestion, are interested in collaboration, or want to learn more about our work, our team is here to help.

Email: genome@nfdp.gov.sa

Explore our expanding resources, learn about our pioneering initiatives, and see how data-driven insights are actively shaping the future of livestock management and looking towards healthier aquatic ecosystems.

item.title: Long-Read Sequencing
item.description:
6.1 PacBio HiFi Sequencing

Platform: PacBio Sequel II / Revio

Applications:

  • De novo genome assembly
  • Structural variant detection
  • Haplotype-resolved assembly
  • Repeat region sequencing

Specifications:

  • Read length: 10-25 kb (HiFi)
  • Accuracy: >99.9%

Coverage Options:

Coverage Applications Price (SAR)
30x Standard assembly 18,000/Gb
50x High-quality assembly 16,000/Gb
80x+ T2T assembly 15,000/Gb

Minimum order: 15 Gb

Turnaround: 4-5 weeks

6.2 Oxford Nanopore Sequencing

Platform: PromethION / MinION

Applications:

  • Ultra-long read assembly
  • Real-time sequencing
  • Structural variant detection
  • Direct RNA/DNA methylation

Read Length: 10 kb - 2 Mb

item.title: Single-Cell Services
item.description:
7.1 Single-Cell RNA-Seq (10x Genomics)

Applications:

  • Cell atlas generation
  • Rare cell identification
  • Developmental biology

Product:

  • 3’ Gene Expression
  • 5’ Gene Expression
  • Multiome (ATAC + Gene Expression)

Price:

  • 3’ (up to 10K cells): 12,000 SAR
  • 5’ (up to 10K cells): 15,000 SAR
  • Multiome: 25,000 SAR

Turnaround: 5-6 weeks

7.2 Single-Cell ATAC-Seq

Applications:

  • Single-cell chromatin accessibility
  • Regulatory landscape

Price: 18,000 SAR (up to 10K cells)

Turnaround: 6 weeks

7.3 Single-Nucleus RNA-Seq

Applications:

item.title: Bioinformatics & Analysis
item.description:
8.1 Standard Analysis Pipelines

Included with Sequencing Services:

  • Quality control reports
  • Read alignment
  • Basic variant calling or gene counts

Add-on Analysis:

Service Applications Price (SAR)
Advanced Variant Annotation Functional impact, pathogenicity +2,000/project
Differential Expression RNA-Seq analysis +3,500/project
Genome Assembly De novo or reference-guided +5,000/genome
Phylogenetic Analysis Tree construction, dating +2,500/project
Metagenome Binning MAG assembly +4,000/project

8.2 Custom Analysis

Hourly Consulting: 150-350 SAR/hour

Expertise:

  • Population genomics
  • GWAS & QTL mapping
  • Multi-omics integration
  • Machine learning models

Minimum: 10 hours

item.title: Platform Architecture
item.description:
System Overview

The NFLDP platform utilizes a cloud-native, microservices-based architecture designed for scalability and high availability.

Core Components

  1. Ingestion Layer: Handles raw genomic data upload and validation.
  2. Processing Pipeline: Nextflow-based workflows for variant calling and assembly.
  3. Data Lake: S3-compatible storage for massive dataset retention.
  4. Knowledge Graph: Semantic layer linking genotype to phenotype.

Tech Stack

  • Frontend: Next.js (React) / Hugo (Documentation)
  • Backend: Python (FastAPI), Go
  • Database: PostgreSQL, Neo4j
  • Orchestration: Kubernetes
